Off the avenue diagonal by a block, this hidden gem is worth looking for.  From the great Sangria, delectable tapas, both pica and main dish, this restaurant won't leave you wishing for more.  I have sampled several items from each of the categories and they have all been 5 star.   Tuna tartar, cod fritters, sirloin aged 21 days, tomato flat bread (best in Barcelona), grilled pulpo, and fresh greens with apples, candied almonds, and blue cheese salad.  All top notch.  Don't miss out on a great restaurant with a very friendly staff and delectable food.  No matter where you are in Barcelona, it will be worth your time to come to Collage.
